## Security Checklist (Maintainer Review)

- [ ] No new dependencies added (or justified below)
- [ ] No dynamic code execution or shell commands with unsanitized input
- [ ] No new network calls or external URLs introduced
- [ ] No changes to `.github/workflows/` or CI configuration
- [ ] No obfuscated code, encoded strings, or minified logic
- [ ] No changes to authentication, secrets, or permissions
- [ ] No cryptographic operations added
- [ ] No file I/O outside project directories
